queryParameters.description: One of the following strings: users, accounts, contacts, leads, prospects, all Will determine which modules are searched using the given search string.

queryParameters.name: order_by
queryParameters.description: columns to sort by (one or more of $sortableColumns) with direction Example: name:asc,id:desc (will sort by last_name ASC and then id DESC)

endpoints.name: List all Notifications

queryParameters.name: Filter
queryParameters.description: The filter expression.

queryParameters.name: Filter ID
queryParameters.description: Identifier for a preexisting filter. If filter is also set, the two filters are joined with an AND.

queryParameters.name: Fields
queryParameters.description: Comma delimited list of fields to return.

queryParameters.name: View
queryParameters.description: Instead of defining the fields argument, the view argument can be used instead.

queryParameters.name: Order By
queryParameters.description: How to sort the returned records, in a comma delimited list with the direction appended to the column name after a colon.

queryParameters.name: q
queryParameters.description: A search expression, will search on this module. Cannot be used at the same time as a filter expression or id.

queryParameters.name: Deleted
queryParameters.description: Boolean to show deleted records in the result set.
